room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Black Dahlia" by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: I had a long drive in Florida and was looking for a game to do along the way, I stopped my search at Escape Cocoa Beach. The owners were awesome. I could tell before I started the room it would be a good one (I can usually tell based on the attitude of the person that greets me).      At this point I've done around 40 rooms and I always think I'm going to crush it.... and I am always wrong. The owner Ryan put some real thought into his puzzles and when a puzzle is solved you feel rewarded instead of frustrated. I love when I ask for a hint and it isn't something ridiculous, instead it was a cleverly place clue that I overlooked.    What was really amazing was the actually scenario. All four of his rooms follow an actual historic event. I did the Black Dahlia and I was impressed that the story, puzzles, props and atmosphere all blended together. Nothing was off.  I would definitely love to go back to Cocoa beach to do their other rooms. Once I reached the 20 room mark I stopped trying to rush through them for the best time and started to enjoy the immersion and scenario. This is why Escape Coca Beach is getting 5 - stars from me. The moment you enter the room you can see the passion and hard work that went into creating an amazing event.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Black Dahlia" by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: The building is so unique and clean! I love the decorations as well. We played Black Dahlia and it was definitely a mind twister. I would 100% go back again!!! Also I love how they have unlimited clues!! Would recommend(:

room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Black Dahlia" by Escape Cocoa Beach in Melbourne
review: Such a great experience, loved the room (Black Dahlia) and our host was very welcoming and informative. He helped us when we needed it and was super friendly. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a fun/challenging activity.
